destinations.bestPriceGuaranteeDescription: Find a lower price? We'll match it. Enjoy the best deals for {name}.
destinations.travelTipsSubtitle: Everything you need to know before you go
destinations.discoverOtherPlaces: Discover other amazing places you might love
destinations.subscribeNewsletter: Subscribe to our newsletter and receive special offers, travel tips, and insider guides
destinations.joinTravelers: Join 50,000+ travelers getting exclusive deals. Unsubscribe anytime.
destinations.faqSubtitle: Everything you need to know about visiting {name}
destinations.faqBestTime: What is the best time to visit {name}?
destinations.faqBestTimeAnswer: The best time to visit {name} is during the cooler months from October to April, when temperatures are pleasant for sightseeing and outdoor activities. The weather is ideal for exploring attractions and participating in tours.
destinations.faqHowManyDays: How many days should I spend in {name}?
destinations.faqHowManyDaysAnswer: We recommend spending at least 3-5 days to experience the main attractions comfortably. However, a week or more allows for a more relaxed pace and exploration of hidden gems, local neighborhoods, and day trips to nearby areas.
destinations.faqIsSafeAnswer: Yes, {name} is generally safe for tourists. As with any destination, exercise normal precautions like being aware of your surroundings, keeping valuables secure, and following local guidance. Our tours prioritize your safety with professional guides.
destinations.faqWhatToPackAnswer: Pack comfortable walking shoes, light breathable clothing for daytime, a light jacket for evenings or air-conditioned spaces, sunscreen, sunglasses, a hat, and any necessary medications. Don't forget your camera to capture the amazing sights!
destinations.faqNeedGuide: Do I need a guide for tours in {name}?
destinations.faqNeedGuideAnswer: While not mandatory, having a local guide significantly enhances your experience. Guides provide insider knowledge, historical context, help navigate crowds efficiently, and ensure you don't miss important details about the attractions.
destinations.faqDressCode: Are there any dress codes I should be aware of?
destinations.faqDressCodeAnswer: For religious sites and certain attractions, modest clothing is required (covering shoulders and knees). It's best to carry a light scarf or shawl. Most restaurants and hotels have no specific dress code, but smart casual is appreciated.
destinations.faqLastMinute: Can I book tours last minute?
destinations.faqLastMinuteAnswer: While we recommend booking in advance for popular tours, many experiences can be booked last minute subject to availability. However, skip-the-line tours and special experiences often sell out, so early booking is advisable.
destinations.faqCancellationAnswer: Most tours offer free cancellation up to 24 hours before the start time for a full refund. Some special events may have different policies. Please check the specific tour details for exact cancellation terms.
destinations.faqMealsIncluded: Are meals included in the tours?
destinations.faqMealsIncludedAnswer: It varies by tour. Some tours include meals or snacks, while others don't. Each tour description clearly states what's included. Food tours naturally include multiple tastings as part of the experience.
destinations.faqMeetingPoints: How do I get to the meeting points?
destinations.faqMeetingPointsAnswer: All tour confirmations include detailed meeting point information with maps and directions. Most meeting points are at central, easy-to-reach locations with good public transport access. Our team is available 24/7 if you need assistance.
destinations.noToursInCategory: There are currently no tours available in the "{name}" category.
destinations.essentialInfoItem1: All tours include professional English-speaking guides
destinations.essentialInfoItem2: Pickup and drop-off from your hotel in Cairo or Giza
destinations.essentialInfoItem3: Small group sizes for a more personalized experience
destinations.essentialInfoItem4: Flexible cancellation policy - cancel up to 24 hours before for a full refund

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you
contact.description: Have a question about a tour? Need help with a booking? Our team is here to help.
contact.sentDescription: We'll get back to you within 24 hours.
contact.failed: Failed to send message. Please try again.
contact.faqDescription: Find quick answers to common questions
contact.privacyConsent: By submitting this form, you agree to our
contact.emergencySupport: Emergency support available 24/7 via phone and live chat
contact.locatedIn: Located in the heart of Cairo, we're ready to help you plan your perfect Egyptian adventure. Visit us for personalized consultation.
contact.followUsDescription: Follow us for travel inspiration and exclusive updates
contact.faqResponseTime: How quickly will I get a response?
contact.faqResponseTimeAnswer: We typically respond to emails within 1 hour during business hours and within 24 hours on weekends.
contact.faqModifyBookingAnswer: Yes! Contact us at least 24 hours before your tour for modifications. Some tours offer free cancellation.
contact.faqGroupDiscountsAnswer: Absolutely! We offer special rates for groups of 10 or more. Contact us for a custom quote.
contact.faqPaymentMethods: What payment methods do you accept?
contact.faqPaymentMethodsAnswer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers. Payment is secure and encrypted.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Your trusted travel partner
about.safetyDescription: Your safety is our top priority on every tour
about.bestPriceDescription: Find a lower price? We'll match it
about.supportDescription: Round-the-clock customer support for peace of mind
about.localExpertsDescription: Professional guides with deep local knowledge
about.heroDescription: Discover hidden gems and unforgettable experiences with our expert guidance.
about.aboutDescription: Your trusted partner for extraordinary travel experiences, with 15 years of expertise in tourism. Egypt's biggest collection of things to do, activities, sightseeing tours, snorkeling, Safari tours, Quad biking, Private boats, and much more.
about.ourStoryP1: Founded with a passion for creating unforgettable memories, Egypt Excursions Online has been a leader in the travel industry for 15 years. We started with a simple goal: to make discovering the world's most incredible destinations accessible and seamless for everyone.
about.ourStoryP2: Our journey began by connecting travelers with authentic, high-quality experiences, and today, we continue that tradition. We are proud to be travel experts, dedicated to curating the best tours, tickets, and activities that offer genuine insight and joy.
about.officialPartnerDescription: We are official partners of top museums and attractions, ensuring authentic and reliable tickets.
about.bestPriceGuaranteedDescription: Our commitment to great value means you get the best price for your adventure, guaranteed.
about.mobileTicketsDescription: No printer needed! Simply show your tickets on your smartphone for quick and easy access.
about.freeCancellationDescription: Enjoy flexibility with free cancellation on most tours up to 8 hours in advance.
about.expertiseDescription: We leverage our deep industry knowledge to craft authentic and enriching experiences for every traveler.
about.passionDescription: Our team is fueled by a love for travel, and we bring that passion to every interaction and every itinerary.
about.communityDescription: We believe in supporting local businesses and building connections that benefit both travelers and host communities.
about.readyToStartDescription: Browse our hand-picked selection of tours and tickets and find your next unforgettable experience.

homepage.heroSubtitle: Book tours, activities, and attractions at the best prices
